DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study help development male contraception ( birth control ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The objective conduct male contraceptive trial evaluate suppressive effect acyline administer combination Testosterone ( T ) progestin depo-medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) . We administer combination three drug : Testosterone ( T ) gel , Depot Medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) Acyline see effect sperm production . The T/DMPA/Acyline combination allow u determine rapid complete gonadotropin suppression mediate early addition GnRH antagonist accelerate enhance suppression spermatogenesis . In prior study testosterone DMPA drug , hormone , find safe , reversibly suppress sperm count zero 80 % men . We hope improve 100 % men add another drug , Acyline . Acyline GnRH antagonist block release LH FSH pituitary . DMPA approve FDA use female contraceptive . The endpoint suppression spermatogenesis zero ( azoospermia ) end treatment phase .
DOC.criteria: Males 1855 In good general health With normal sperm count Willing use acceptable form contraception Men poor health Significant chronic acute medical illness Skin condition might interfere exacerbate testosterone gel Known history alcohol , illicit drug anabolic steroid abuse Abnormal reproductive function Participation longterm male contraceptive study within past three month
